entity.name: content2
entity.query:
select distinct CONCAT(n.nid,'-',n2.nid,'-',ccf.field_country_code_value) as product_id, header2.field_header_value as titulo, concat_ws(' ', header.field_header_value, link.field_title_link_title, body.body_value, content.field_desc_content_1_value ) as text1, n2.language as profile_id, ccf.field_country_code_value as country_id, url.alias as text2, 'content' as type,CONCAT('sites/default/files/', file.filename) as propiedades
from node n left join field_data_field_header header on n.nid=header.entity_id left join field_data_field_title_link link on n.nid=link.entity_id left join field_data_body body on n.nid=body.entity_id left join field_data_field_desc_content_1 content on n.nid=content.entity_id
,node n2 inner join field_data_field_country_group cgf on n2.nid=cgf.entity_id inner join taxonomy_term_hierarchy tth on cgf.field_country_group_tid= tth.tid or cgf.field_country_group_tid = tth.parent inner join taxonomy_term_data cgtd on tth.parent=cgtd.tid inner join taxonomy_term_data ctd on tth.tid=ctd.tid inner join field_data_field_country_code ccf on ctd.tid=ccf.entity_id inner join field_data_field_header header2 on n2.nid=header2.entity_id left join field_data_field_url_image_solr image on n2.nid=image.entity_id left join file_managed file on image.field_url_image_solr_fid=file.fid inner join field_data_field_layout layout on n2.nid=layout.entity_id inner join layoutmanager_mod_disposition disposition on layout.field_layout_layout=disposition.lid and n2.nid=disposition.nid inner join url_alias url on url.source = CONCAT('node/', n2.nid)
where n.type in ('html_module', 'image_and_text_module', 'imghighlight_module','text_module') and n.status=1 and n2.type='dist0x' and n2.status=1 and LOCATE(CONCAT('"',n.nid,'"'),disposition.data) > 0 and n2.language = 'it'
